```{r setup, include=FALSE, }
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```



`metajam` is an R package to ease the Download and import of data and metadata from repositories in the [DataONE](https://www.dataone.org/) federation of data repository into R.

```{r fig.align='center'}
knitr::include_graphics("metajam_hex.png")
```

Package website: https://nceas.github.io/metajam/
